creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Donald Winston

markings:
On backing board: exhibition label from the Tate Gallery; MIA loan label [L74.104.9 Winston].
On frame: label [UAM #357 - Excellence / O. Dix: Little Girl / Mr. and Mrs. Donald Winston, L.A.]; number (in graphite) [75 - 4201]
provenance: Possibly Karl Nierendorf, Cologne, Germany by 1924. Donald and Elizabeth Martin Winston, Los Angeles, California by 1975; gift to MIA in 1975.
title: Little Girl
